TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsOneOf extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示可选的单词或短语的列表，其中所有可用于匹配语音输入。

span.span: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象包含一系列可选的单词或短语，解说时可能会识别其中的任何一个。A object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken. 可以生成从数组的替代项列表对象或数组的对象。You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of objects or arrays of objects. 使用属性来访问列表中的替代项。Use the property to access the alternative items in the list. 类表示`one-of`World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 从元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。The class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 璝惠 SRGS`one-of`元素，并通过 System.Speech，其支持有关的详细信息请参阅[一个-元素的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801)。For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以构造的实例数组中的类对象的数组从对象，或为空列表。You can construct an instance of the class from an array of objects, from an array of objects, or as an empty list. 使用对象而不是一个替代项列表中的对象，可将应用的属性到每个项在列表中，如， ， ，和。Using objects instead of objects in a list of alternatives lets you apply properties of to each item in the list, such as , , , and .

summary.span: 获取 元素中包含的所有备选项的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可选的单词和短语，此属性返回可能已添加到作为或对象。The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the as or objects.
